00087 #ifndef PCA9555
00088 #define PCA9555
00089 
00090 #include <inttypes.h>
00091 
00092 #define PCA9555_DEVICE_ADDRESS 0x40
00093 
00098 typedef enum {
00099   PCA9555_DEV_000               = 0b000,
00100   PCA9555_DEV_001               = 0b001,
00101   PCA9555_DEV_010               = 0b010,
00102   PCA9555_DEV_011               = 0b011,
00103   PCA9555_DEV_100               = 0b100,
00104   PCA9555_DEV_101               = 0b101,
00105   PCA9555_DEV_110               = 0b110,
00106   PCA9555_DEV_111               = 0b111,
00107 } PCA9555_DEVICE;
00108 
00112 typedef enum {
00113   PCA9555_PORT_0                = 0,
00114   PCA9555_PORT_1                = 1,
00115 } PCA9555_PORT;
00116 
00120 typedef enum {
00121   PCA9555_INPUT_0               = 0,
00122   PCA9555_INPUT_1               = 1,
00123   PCA9555_OUTPUT_0              = 2,
00124   PCA9555_OUTPUT_1              = 3,
00125   PCA9555_POLARITY_INV_0        = 4,
00126   PCA9555_POLARITY_INV_1        = 5,
00127   PCA9555_DIRECTION_0           = 6,
00128   PCA9555_DIRECTION_1           = 7,
00129 } PCA9555_REGISTER;
00130
